summary: The code defines a base value (65535) and mentions that the data or code can have complementary values in bitwise and numerical forms. It also suggests that copying could be spontaneous.

details.comment: The code defines a base value (65535) and mentions that the data or code can have complementary values in bitwise and numerical forms. It also suggests that copying could be spontaneous.
details.content:
# dna: complementary
# triple dna: 1 -> 3 or 2 -> 3
# it could be code or data
# type: bitwise (base n) complementary & numerical complementary (rotary)
base = 65535
# copy shall be spontaneous
